none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 03, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
Black Sky Monster smothers you like...well, perhaps like a monster swallowing a blackened sky. Two pieces - slow, deliberate, ominous and beautiful - though it's beauty that is thoroughly and intentionally masked by layer upon layer of sonic despair. As compelling as the sounds on this 2011 release from AJILVSGA are, the feelings that result from deep listening are what really makes it worth your time. BLACK SKY MONSTER
